alert.note: Alert for Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 11 at 1:40AM EST until November 11 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM EST FOR NORTHWESTERN SUMTER AND EAST CENTRAL RICHLAND COUNTIES... At 140 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Shaw Air Base, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Sumter and east central Richland Counties, including the following locations... Dalzell, Dinkins Mill, Cherryvale, Wateree River Correctional Institution, Rembert, Stateburg and Wedgewood. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to an interior room or closet on the lowest floor of a sturdy building immediately.
